front.title: •Daroe (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Information Broker. When deployed, may deploy a droid here or a Restraining Bolt from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During battle, may retarget an opponent's weapon targeting your droid to another one of your characters present (even Daroe).
front.lore: Jawa who has inside connections with the Empire. Frequently speaks with his Imperial contact, whom he reports to regarding Rebel activity in the Outer Rim.

conceptBy: (Original concept by Ryan Jellison and Tom Marlin)
pulls: A droid or a restraining bolt
